page.title: 05Way of Life
page.content: Our area is on the whole an affluent one,largely untouched by the modern problems of recession and unemployment.Home and land prices are high and are rising faster than the rate of inflation. There is a preponderance of detached houses,many of them dating from after the last war and most of the terraced and semi-detached houses are also of recent origins. There is little or no industry within our area and so this is very much a commuter belt with many people working in London or along the M4 corridor. Local transport is fairly scarce and so most families are car owners by necessity and not just choice.
